title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pear-shaped linen tassel, braided and knotted. Double loops are attached to pear-shaped unit from which hang three knotted elements, alternating and attached to three smaller units. From center hangs a ball.
